document_data.name: Lizard's Gizzard
document_data.mainbody: The '''Lizard's Gizzard''' was a boarding house that operated in [[Daggerford]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]]. It was owned by a [[half-orc]] woman named [[Sasha (Daggerford)|Sasha]] who had a soft spot for those people that society cast away.

Location.Atmosphere: While its sign featured rather gruesome depiction of the young [[Tyndal]] eviscerating a [[lizardfolk]] marauder, the Lizard's Gizzard was a place of altruism. Its staff comprised many young women that were left orphaned and abandoned.

document_data.Services: The establishment was wholly dedicated to offering folks a place to stay at night. It offered nothing in the way of libations or provisions.
